body.title: Senior Software Engineer
body.summary: Highly skilled Content Enabler with a proven track record of integrating travel industry providers, optimizing hotel content, and enhancing system performance to drive cost-efficiency and booking conversions.

body.title: Senior Software Engineer
body.summary: Pioneered a cross-border e-commerce platform with print-on-demand, dropshipping, and integrated marketplace solutions, driving growth through strategic partnerships and innovative technologies.

body.title: Senior Software Engineer
body.summary: Modernized authentication, enhanced system reliability, and improved reporting through technical expertise and a focus on performance optimization.

body.title: Full-Stack Developer
body.summary: Full-Stack Developer with expertise in building high-performance cryptocurrency trading platforms using Golang, Node.js, and React, delivering innovative solutions like Daollobit and Tadadex.

body.title: Software Development Team Lead
body.summary: Led the Gateway Team, revolutionizing travel booking with a microservices-based API system, driving operational efficiency, and fostering a high-performing engineering team.
